entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 this evening then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 17 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to rain showers in the evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
